duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize CASA utility billing and expense technology platform to produce on-time and accurate resident bills on behalf of clients.
Review and analyze resident bills and collaborate with clients to finalize and process monthly utility bills for their residents, including some data entry depending on client bill formats and types.
Review variance reports, datasets, and research explanations to ensure accuracy and consistency of billing practices and results.
Collaborate across the Billing Operations Team to ensure efficient movement of properties through the billing process.
Partner with clients to obtain billing approval as quickly as possible so statements can be released to residents in a timely manner.
Obtain expert knowledge of the CASA software platform, a valuable skill for potential future roles within the organization.

education_certification.credential: College degree required (no-post college work experience required), or equivalent work experience
